events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not working as expected and I want to request a refund immediately.
The customer's case has been identified as a refund request due to product dissatisfaction.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. for further assistance regarding the refund.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know what the specific issue with the product was?
My order number is 12345678. The product stopped working within hours and does not turn on anymore.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund for you. Please send the product back using the prepaid return label we will email you.
That sounds great, thank you. I will send it back as soon as I receive the label.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed promptly.
This is a friendly follow-up to ensure you received the return label and to check if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues have been reported, we are closing your case. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is highly appreciated.
